        Initilialization function.
        """
        assert(....)
        
        # Type of distribution
        self.type = 
        self.support = 
        
        # parameters
        self. ... = ...
                
        # moments
        self.set_moments(mean = , variance = , skewness = , kurtosis = 3. + )
        
        # quantiles
        self.set_median(median = )
        
        # others
        self. ... = ...
        self.set_mode(mode = )
        self.set_entropy(entropy = )
        
        # name (or nickname)
        self.set_name(name)
        
        
    def PMF(self, ...):
        """
        Method implementing the Probability Mass Function (PMF) for the ... distribution.
        """
        ...
        return pmf

    def PDF(self, x):
        """
        Method implementing the Probability Density Function (PDF) for the ... distribution.
        """
        ...
        return pdf
    
    def CDF(self, ...):
        """
        Method implementing the Cumulative Distribution Function (CDF) for the ... distribution.
        """
        ...

        return cdf
